Package index

All functions

benefit()
Calculate taxon conservation benefit
build_tree_ranges()
Derive ranges for the internal nodes of a tree
get_tip_comm()
Get community data for terminal taxa
moss
California moss spatial phylogenetic data
moss_data()
Load example phylospatial data on California mosses
phylospatial()
Create a spatial phylogeny object
plot_lambda()
Plot alternative lambda values
ps_add_dissim()
Add community dissimilarity data to a phylospatial object
ps_canape()
Binary randomization tests including CANAPE
ps_dissim()
Quantitative phylogenetic dissimilarity
ps_diversity()
Calculate spatial phylogenetic diversity and endemism metrics
ps_get_ranges()
Get phylospatial community data in spatial format
ps_prioritize()
Phylogenetic conservation prioritization
ps_rand()
Null model randomization analysis of alpha diversity metrics
ps_regions()
Phyologenetic regionalization
ps_rgb()
Color space ordination of spatial phylogenetic composition
ps_simulate()
Simulate a toy spatial phylogenetic data set
quantize()
Stratified randomization of community matrix
to_spatial()
Convert a site-by-variable matrix into a SpatRaster or sf object
